ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ قٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْمَجِيدِ
ayahs.translation: Qaf. By the honored Qur'an...

ayahs.text: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
ayahs.translation: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.

ayahs.text: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًۭا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌۢ بَعِيدٌۭ
ayahs.translation: When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant return."

ayahs.text: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ
ayahs.translation: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record.

ayahs.text: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِىٓ أَمْرٍۢ مَّرِيجٍ
ayahs.translation: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition.

ayahs.text: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts?

ayahs.text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind,

ayahs.text: تَبْصِرَةًۭ وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍۢ مُّنِيبٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allah].

ayahs.text: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ مُّبَٰرَكًۭا فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَحَبَّ ٱلْحَصِيدِ
ayahs.translation: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest

ayahs.text: وَٱلنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَٰتٍۢ لَّهَا طَلْعٌۭ نَّضِيدٌۭ
ayahs.translation: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers -

ayahs.text: رِّزْقًۭا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةًۭ مَّيْتًۭا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخُرُوجُ
ayahs.translation: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the resurrection.

ayahs.text: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍۢ وَأَصْحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
ayahs.translation: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud

ayahs.text: وَعَادٌۭ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَٰنُ لُوطٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot

ayahs.text: وَأَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍۢ ۚ كُلٌّۭ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
ayahs.translation: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubba'. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.

ayahs.text: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلْخَلْقِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى لَبْسٍۢ مِّنْ خَلْقٍۢ جَدِيدٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation.

ayahs.text: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ
ayahs.translation: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein

ayahs.text: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌۭ
ayahs.translation: When the two receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left.

ayahs.text: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌۭ
ayahs.translation: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].

ayahs.text: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
ayahs.translation: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid.

ayahs.text: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ
ayahs.translation: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.

ayahs.text: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌۭ وَشَهِيدٌۭ
ayahs.translation: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.

ayahs.text: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍۢ مِّنْ هَٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌۭ
ayahs.translation: [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover, so your sight, this Day, is sharp."

ayahs.text: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ
ayahs.translation: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."

ayahs.text: أَلْقِيَا فِى جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍۢ
ayahs.translation: [Allah will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever,

ayahs.text: مَّنَّاعٍۢ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍۢ مُّرِيبٍ
ayahs.translation: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter,

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ
ayahs.translation: Who made [as equal] with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment."

ayahs.text: ۞ قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ وَلَٰكِن كَانَ فِى ضَلَٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍۢ
ayahs.translation: His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error."

ayahs.text: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ
ayahs.translation: [Allah] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning.

ayahs.text: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلْقَوْلُ لَدَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّٰمٍۢ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
ayahs.translation: The word will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants."

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍۢ
ayahs.translation: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more,"

ayahs.text: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
ayahs.translation: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far,

ayahs.text: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍۢ
ayahs.translation: [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to Allah] and keeper [of His covenant]

ayahs.text: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍۢ مُّنِيبٍ
ayahs.translation: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].

ayahs.text: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَٰمٍۢ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُلُودِ
ayahs.translation: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."

ayahs.text: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌۭ
ayahs.translation: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more.

ayahs.text: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًۭا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
ayahs.translation: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape?

ayahs.text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌۭ
ayahs.translation: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].

ayahs.text: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍۢ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness.

ayahs.text: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ ٱلْغُرُوبِ
ayahs.translation: So be patient, [O Muhammad], over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting,

ayahs.text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ
ayahs.translation: And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration.

ayahs.text: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍۢ قَرِيبٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near -

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيْحَةَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُرُوجِ
ayahs.translation: The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves].

ayahs.text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًۭا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌۭ
ayahs.translation: On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us.

ayahs.text: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍۢ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
ayahs.translation: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur'an whoever fears My threat.
